About Me

Highly motivated and customer-focused tech support professional with a proven track record of resolving complex technical issues, seeking to transition into a Front-End Development role. Offering a strong foundation in troubleshooting, problem-solving, and exceptional communication skills, I aim to leverage my technical expertise and passion for creating engaging user experiences to contribute to the success of a dynamic web development team. Committed to continuous learning and growth, I am eager to apply my strong analytical abilities and attention to detail in crafting intuitive and visually appealing front-end solutions.
